description:
A kind man marries a crane who weaves on his loom. A man goes out to fish on a stormy day and doesn`t come back.  Gohachi sumo wrestles a tengu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Karoku and the Crane / The Shiranui Pine / Gohachi Is Kidnapped by a Tengu
Karoku to Tsuru / Shiranui no Matsu / Tengu ni Sarawareta Gohachi
嘉六と鶴 / 不知火の松 / 天狗にさらわれた吾八
